channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What it takes to be wealthy in America: $2.3 million, Charles Schwab says
item.description: Survey respondents said it feels like it takes more money to feel wealthy today compared to last year.

item.title: Exclusive: Crypto startup LI.FI raises $29 million for cross-blockchain price discovery tool
item.description: The company aims to make moving across blockchains more efficient.

item.title: Netflix’s takeover of Warner Brothers is a nightmare for consumers
item.description: Netflix promotes itself as an innovator, but its skyhigh bid for Warner Brothers suggests that its trendsetter days have peaked.

item.title: Microsoft Warning — Act Rapidly And Change Passwords As Attacks Strike
item.description: Rapidly change your password, the Microsoft security team urges as Shai-Hulud Dune Worm cloud attacks continue.

item.title: Quordle Hints And Answers For Friday, December 12
item.description: Looking for some help with today’s Quordle words? Some hints and the answers are right here to give you a hand.

item.title: AI Ambitions Are Growing Faster Than IT Foundations
item.description: Recent media reports have pointed to some growing skepticism around AI, especially where early promises of transformation haven’t materialized yet.

item.title: Trump slams Fed’s third-straight rate cut as ‘too small,’ saying he wishes it was twice as large
item.description: Three Fed officials dissented from the move, the most dissents in six years and a sign of deep divisions on the committee.

item.title: Fed delivers third straight rate cut but 'dot plot' projects just one cut in 2026
item.description: Federal Reserve policymakers cut interest rates by 25 basis points for the third straight meeting, though their "dot plot" projections suggest only on...

item.title: Five Years Of ‘Cyberpunk 2077,’ My Favorite Game Of All Time
item.description: Cyberpunk 2077 is my favorite game of all time, and as it celebrates five years since release, I reflect on what it meant to me.

item.title: A San Francisco woman just gave birth in a Waymo robotaxi—and Waymo says it’s not the first time that’s happened
item.description: “We’re proud to be a trusted ride for moments big and small, serving riders from just seconds old to many years young,” Waymo said.

item.title: AT&T Teams Up With Google And Abode For Smart Security Package
item.description: AT&T Connected Life mixes devices from Google and Abode and adds professional security monitoring too.

item.title: Eli Lilly obesity drug results in weight loss — and reduced knee pain — in trial
First-time unemployment claims surging after Thanksgiving
S&P and Nasdaq under tech-sector pressure as Dow negotiates gain after Fed cut
Economic calendar: Unemployment and trade data on docket following Fed rate cut
Nintendo's stock hit by rising memory chip prices
GoFundMe increasingly being used to fundraise for basic economic needs like food, housing
item.description: Essential expense fundraising surged 20% on GoFundMe as "monthly bills" became the second-fastest growing fundraising category behind "charity" campai...

item.title: Small businesses report record monthly surge in price increases as inflation pressure mounts
item.description: Small businesses hit a record high for price increases in November, with 34% raising prices amid persistent inflation pressures, an NFIB survey reveal...

item.title: Fed cuts interest rates for third straight time amid uncertainty over labor market, inflation
item.description: The Federal Reserve announced its third straight interest rate cut following its December meeting amid concerns about slowing labor market despite inf...

item.title: AutoZone opens 53 new stores while navigating inflation and tariff cost increases
item.description: AutoZone plans an aggressive store expansion with 53 new locations opened globally in the latest quarter, bringing total to 7,710 stores as auto parts...

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
